name: VideoSource
longDescription: Source for video. UDP, RTSP and UVC Cameras may be supported supported depending on Vehicle and QGroundControl version.

name: VideoUDPPort
longDescription: UDP port to bind to for video stream.

name: VideoRTSPUrl
longDescription: RTSP url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live
